title: MLOX — Augmented Lox in C
summary: A custom interpreted language in C, extending LOX with runtime enhancements and modern features like ternary operators, OOP primitives, native string methods, mathematical operations, and file I/O.

title: CoCode — Collaborative Code Editor
summary: A web-based collaborative code editor with real-time syncing, multi-user concurrency, and Monaco-based editing using Firebase Realtime Database.

title: ChabaCrunch — Restaurant Analytics
summary: Led a 4-member team processing 1M+ TouchBistro transactions across Canada and the U.S. through unified pipelines, with Random Forest model achieving 85% accuracy for venue concept imputation.

title: Project Harmonics — Data Sonification
summary: A Python/Pandas tool to sonify particle physics datasets by mapping particle IDs, momentum, and angles into MIDI files, promoting accessible STEM education for differently abled students.
